alert.note: Alert for Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; San Rafael Swell; Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 12 at 8:42PM MDT until June 12 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 9 PM MDT MONDAY... ...HEAT ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity, Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell, Western Canyonlands and San Rafael Swell. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 9 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Patchy blowing dust is possible, which may cause reduced visibility as well as rapid fluctuations in visibility. Winds will cause difficult travel conditions for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers, especially along east to west oriented routes. Gusty winds will cause rough conditions on area waterways, including Lake Powell.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; San Rafael Swell; Western Canyonlands
